changelog: Instance name - visible within LemonSqueezy is now unhashed, using computer name.'
Input boxes changed to text controls for consistent look.
Option checkboxes made persistent between launches, exit action captures current state.
App bundled as universal binary to support both Intel and Apple Silicon Macs.

version_history.comment:
Instance name - visible within LemonSqueezy is now unhashed, using computer name.'
        Input boxes changed to text controls for consistent look.
        Input box labels updated.
        Option checkboxes made persistent between launches, exit action captures current state.
